review: absolutely wonderful. I have used the apple tv in the past and the Chromecast far exceeds the capability of apple tv. I use Chromecast to stream all of my media to a tv that only has a digital converter box since i do not want to pay to have an additional set top box. There are no additional service fees other than what services you already pay for (netflix, HBO, etc). I highly recommend.

review: This would be an awesome device if it worked consistently. Every other day, however, I get "No Cast Devices Found", even though no settings were changed and the wifi network is working fine.  Inexplicably, it will start working again between an hour and a day later. Not worth the money.
